resources.string: Rhönblick is a municipality in the Rhön in the Schmalkalden-Meiningen district in the Franconian south of Thuringia . Its head office is located in the Helmershausen district.Its head office is located in the Helmershausen district.There were witch hunts in the districts of Bettenhausen, Hermannsfeld, Seeba and Stedtlingen from 1603 to 1681 . In total , 41 people were accused and 21 were executed in these witch trials. The municipality of Rhönblick was formed on August 1, 1996 by decree of the Interior Minister of Thuringia.The communities of Gerthausen, Helmershausen and Wohlmuthausen were previously merged into the Rhönblick administrative community.On November 2, 2014, Christoph Friedrich was elected as the new mayor of the municipality of Rhönblick with 84.1% of the valid votes. The voter turnout was 37.4%.

"Brotterode-Trusetal is located in the north of the Schmalkalden-Meiningen district in the Thuringian Forest on the upper reaches of the Truse . In the north, the border of the city is also the border of the Schmalkalden-Meiningen district and the Gotha district , in the east the municipality of Floh-Seligenthal borders the urban area, and in the south the municipalities of Fambach and Breitungen/Werra . In the west, the city's borders are also the border of the Schmalkalden-Meiningen district and the Wartburg district. The Rennsteig marks the northern boundary of Brotterode , and along its course you come to the Beerberggrotte, it is located on the western slope of the Beerbergstein .

Floh-Seligenthal is located in the north of the Schmalkalden-Meiningen district on the southwest slope of the Thuringian Forest directly on the Rennsteig . The absolute height of the local locations varies between 340 m above sea level. NN and 480 m above sea level. NN. The municipality lies on the upper reaches of the Schmalkalde river . The mountains facing the Rennsteig have heights of over 800 m above sea level. NN and are easily accessible via an extensive network of hiking trails. At around 780 m above sea level. The mountain lake Ebertswiese, which is known far beyond the region, is located NN. Neighboring communities are Brotterode-Trusetal , Fambach , Schmalkalden , Steinbach-Hallenberg as well as Tambach-Dietharz , Georgenthal , Friedrichroda and Tabarz

The Grabfeld or Grabfeldgau is located in the border area of southern Thuringia and northern Bavaria. It is up to 679 m above sea level. NN high, flat undulating to hilly, rarely mountainous landscape , which is predominantly made up of rocks from Muschelkalk and Keuper . The Grabfeldgau lies in the north of the Main Franconian Plateau between the Rhön and the foothills of the Thuringian Forest . Compared to the surrounding area, favorable climatic conditions and soil conditions prevail in the grave field, [1]which is why the landscape is dominated by agriculture over large areas. Belonging to the East Franconian dialect area , the grave field is part of Franconia
